name: PackageHero
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: package hero
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You are the boss of a small logistics company and your mission is to deliver as many packages as possible. Starting with a small fleet, you'll increase its size as the game progresses. You'll not only buy more vehicles, but also different types, up to cargo trains or delivery drones.

In direct competition with other players, you'll compete weekly for the first place in the ranking list.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
